Opportunity Name: 351 N Rife St Aransas Pass TX 78336
description:
!!SELLER FINANCING/RENT TO OWN!!!
Welcome to 351 N Rife in Aransas Pass! This cozy 4-bedroom, 1-bath home offers 1,210 sq. ft. of updated living space with a warm, inviting feel. The beautifully updated kitchen features gorgeous new quartz countertops, complemented by matching finishes in the bathroom. One of the bedrooms is a garage conversion, offering a flexible space perfect for guests, a home office, or a playroom. The large backyard is ideal for gatherings, pets, or creating your own outdoor retreat. Conveniently located near schools, shopping, and local dining. Owner is open to seller financing and rent-to-own options, making this a great opportunity for buyers looking for flexibility and comfort in a great coastal location!

Traditional lending, Seller-finance, and Rent to own options available
Discover comfort in this charming single-story home. Built in 2015, this 3-bedroom, 2-bath features an open-concept design with abundant natural light and modern finishes throughout. The spacious living area flows seamlessly into the dining room and kitchen, creating an ideal space for everyday living and entertaining. As the kitchen is equipped with ample cabinetry, generous countertop space, and a open layout for effortless cooking and hosting. The private primary suite includes a full ensuite bath, while two additional bedrooms provide versatility for guest or a home office.
Situated on a generous 0.34-acre lot with no HOA, the property offers a large backyard with endless potential whether you envision a garden, play area, outdoor entertaining space, or future expansion. Enjoy the tranquility of a peaceful neighborhood while remaining just minutes from shopping, dining, parks, and convenient access to major roadways. Owner is open to seller finance and rent-to-own option, making this a great opportunity for buyers who are looking for flexibility and comfort.

MOTIVATED SELLER- BRING ALL OFFERS! 
This lovely property in sought after Tara Estates offers comfort and luxury. Situated on a 0.81-acre corner lot, this all-brick ranch home features four bedrooms and two and a half baths. The highlight is the 40x20 saltwater in-ground pool, perfect for relaxation. Inside, the den with a cozy fireplace is ideal for gatherings. Formal living room & separate dining room offer lots of space for entertaining family and friends. The 13x17 sunroom is finished, but not heated and cooled and opens to a covered deck, blending indoor and outdoor spaces. The property includes two semi-finished attic rooms, a storage building, and a two-car garage. With a new $26,000 architectural roof, this home combines upgrades with timeless appeal, all within a privacy-fenced lot. Possible owner financing for 80% loan, 20 years @ 1% under the going rate. Bring All Offers!

Step into this beautifully updated Heritage District gem in Irving — offering 3 beds, 2 baths, 2 spacious living rooms—both with soaring vaulted ceilings. Large back living room is ideal for entertaining. Upstairs flex studio adds versatility. Natural light pours through expansive windows. Updates include windows, flooring, paint, foundation, HVAC, roof & more! Enjoy a long driveway, gas cooking, and unbeatable location. Close to dining, shopping, and highways for easy commute. Schedule a tour today!
Owner finance available: $350k down, up to 15 years at 11% interest. $1,819 monthly

Owner Financing Available – Investor Opportunity! Foreign nationals are welcome.
Sales Price: $220,000 USD with only 10% down. Attractive financing terms at 10% interest for the first 2 years, followed by 11.99% with a 5-year balloon. Strong potential as a rental property or portfolio addition, offering stable returns and long-term value.

Beautifully renovated 3-bedroom, 1-bath home featuring a spacious front and backyard. The updated kitchen offers ample cabinet space, granite countertops, refrigerator, and electric stove. An open family and dining room combination provides the perfect setting for entertaining. Enjoy brand-new wall A/C units, hardwood flooring throughout, and ceiling fans with remotes in every room. Washer/dryer hookups are included for convenience. Outside, you’ll find covered parking and a long driveway with room for multiple vehicles. With plenty of outdoor space and a location close to shopping, dining, and banking, this home is move-in ready and waiting for you. 

Financiamiento del propietario disponible – ¡Oportunidad para inversores! Se da la bienvenida a ciudadanos extranjeros. Precio de venta: $220,000 USD con solo un 10% de enganche. Condiciones de financiamiento atractivas al 10% de interés durante los primeros 2 años, seguido de 11.99% con un pago global a 5 años. Gran potencial como propiedad de alquiler o adición a su portafolio, ofreciendo rendimientos estables y valor a largo plazo.
Hermosa casa renovada de 3 habitaciones y 1 baño, con un amplio jardín delantero y trasero. La cocina actualizada ofrece amplios gabinetes, encimeras de granito, refrigerador y estufa eléctrica. Una combinación de sala familiar y comedor abierta proporciona el entorno perfecto para entretener. Disfrute de unidades de aire acondicionado nuevas, pisos de madera en toda la casa y ventiladores de techo con control remoto en cada habitación. Se incluyen conexiones para lavadora y secadora para mayor comodidad. En el exterior, encontrará estacionamiento cubierto y un largo camino de entrada con espacio para varios vehículos. Con mucho espacio al aire libre y una ubicación cercana a tiendas, restaurantes y bancos, esta casa está lista para mudarse y esperándole.

The perfect Norman retreat with Little Axe Schools. Discover your fresh start in this completely remodeled 2-bed, 1-bath home, designed for simple and modern living. Imagine enjoying your morning coffee on your almost one-acre property, with all the latest updates inside. From the brand-new roof and stylish flooring to the fresh paint and appliances, every detail has been thoughtfully updated. The small carport adds a touch of convenience. The owner is flexible regarding the mobile home on the property, which can be purchased separately or removed before closing. Don't miss this opportunity—call to schedule a showing.
Owner will Finance with 10% down

Sitting on nearly a half-acre with water rights to Petty Creek, this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in Alberton is ready for its next chapter. Enjoy the convenience of a detached shop, an RV hook-up with amp service, and exterior wiring perfect for heating your truck or recreational toys in the colder months.
Inside, you’ll find a spacious open layout with a generous living room and kitchen, plus brand-new appliances, washer, and dryer already in place.
Step outside to relax on either of the two covered porches, or take a quick 2-minute walk to the Clark Fork River boat ramp—the perfect spot to fish, float, or simply enjoy time by the water.
With room to spread out, modern upgrades, and versatile outdoor amenities, this property combines practicality with charm—all just a short drive from Missoula. Sellers have upgraded all electrical work from the previous inspection when they purchased the home, new carpet, and added a walk-in shower in the en-suite bathroom. They are also offering a $1,000 flooring credit to address pet damage on parts of floor. 
Note: Home is not on a permanent foundation. Sellers are willing to offer owner financing with the right amount down.

Opportunity Name: 4259 Dairy Farm Rd Panama City FL 32404
description:
BEST DEAL in Bylsma Manor Estates - With NO HOA! HURRY - This stunning 3-bed/2-bath home is the lowest-priced gem in one of Panama City's most desirable, well-maintained neighborhoods and it's priced to sell FAST. This is a prime, central location home, just minutes from top schools, shopping, beaches, and HWY 231, allowing for easy regional and local access. This quiet and safe neighborhood, with tree-lined streets, boast pride of ownership. Perfect neighborhood to walk the dog and or walk with the family. As you step inside, you'll notice the many custom upgrades everywhere. Soaring vaulted ceilings in the living room elegant trey ceilings in all bedrooms, ceramic tile throughout the living areas; rich wood-look flooring in bedrooms & master bath. Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances featuring upgraded custom cabinetry and Corian countertops with tile backsplash. The Living room centers a cozy electric fireplace - perfect for movie nights or quiet evenings. Also the home features a bright, airy Florida sunroom bathed in natural light - a plant lover's dream. Your private outdoor oasis awaits in the fully fenced backyard, which is backing up to a serene nature preserve. The yard features an expansive patio with a custom pergola (wired for lights & outlets!) and a outdoor shower for post-beach rinses, or after yard work. This area is ideal for stargazing, BBQs, or unwinding in peace and quiet. This isn't just a house it's a move-in-ready retreat with rare custom finishes in a family-friendly, low-maintenance community. Don't wait - homes like this don't last. Schedule your private tour TODAY before it's gone!
Seller may consider Owner Financing with 10% Down Payment Addl.Terms to Discuss

Opportunity Name: 294 Eagle Dr Big Bear Lake CA 92315
description:
Welcome to 294 Eagle Dr in the Eagle Point neighborhood of Big Bear Lake, CA! Incredible opportunity to move in, landlord, or AirB&B this upgraded & turnkey, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom mountain cabin - with parking for 2 vehicles plus RV parking (or 2 additional vehicles), expansive & elevated back deck, quarry rock fireplace & chimney, 6000 sq foot lot with soaring pines, park/playground frontage, and just 2 blocks from the beach and lake! Income potential of $49K per year, based on surrounding, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom AirB&Bs, and for sale for $50K below pre-appraised value of $450K for a quick sale! And with million-dollar homes as neighbors! Offers due Monday 11/3 by 5PM. Seller may carry purchase or lease-to-own with the right terms.
All new everything including new interior & exterior paint, new high-end stainless-steel appliances (including gas oven/stove & laundry washer/dryer), new scratch-resistant luxury-vinyl plank flooring throughout, new plumbing - mainline & fixtures including toilet, new grounded outlets, new recessed & evening lighting - inside & out, new wood sanding & staining - inside & out, new concrete foundation walls & surrounding cement including new stairs & railing, and newer roof, water-heater, and double-paned windows. Expansive storage & workshop space under the home, as well as additional enclosed storage under the deck for equipment and/or park, lake & snow toys. Make your downpayment back in 3-4 years with AirB&B, while enjoying the incredible amenities of the Eagle Point peninsula, as well as the surrounding community.
All available within 2 blocks from the property: large park with trees and open meadows, 2 playgrounds, swimming beach & fishing lake, sports courts & fields (sand volleyball, basketball, tennis, pickleball,, softball, baseball), and free city trolley to the new Big Bear Zoo, 9-Hole Golf Course & Clubhouse, Big Bear Village, Bear Mountain & Snow Summit Ski Resorts, Marina, the North Shore & more! Host visitors or personally enjoy one of Southern California's only 4-season resorts with watersports - boating, fishing & swimming; snowsports - skiing, sledding, tubing, snowboarding, skating & snowshoeing; mountain sports - biking, birding, & hiking; movie theater, music venues, restaurants, shopping, and year-round events & festivals. Per appraiser, this property is unmatched in upgrades compared to other similar cabins throughout Big Bear Lake. View and make your offer ASAP! This property will sell quickly.

Welcome to 3221 George Ave, a stunning modern home built in 2020 and thoughtfully upgraded with custom features throughout. This residence combines contemporary design with everyday functionality, offering a layout and finishes that stand out from the rest. Step inside to an open-concept living space centered around a designer kitchen featuring a waterfall island, custom cabinets, and decorative lighting. The kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining and living areas, creating the perfect setting for entertaining and gatherings. The spacious primary suite is privately tucked away from the secondary bedrooms, providing a quiet retreat. It features a spa-inspired ensuite bath and custom closets designed for maximum organization. Additional bedrooms are generously sized, each offering comfort and style. Upgrades extend throughout the home, with attention to detail evident in the finishes and lighting. A covered patio opens to a large backyard, perfect for outdoor living, grilling, or simply relaxing in your own space. With its modern construction, custom upgrades, and inviting layout, this home is move-in ready and designed to impress. Conveniently located in Forest Hill, you’ll enjoy easy access to schools, parks, shopping, and major highways for a quick commute throughout DFW.

Beautifully renovated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom residence offering 1,548 square feet of modern living space. From the moment you step inside, you'll be captivated by the thoughtful updates and high-quality finishes throughout.

This home offers brand-new LVP flooring, fresh interior paint, and new fixtures, giving it a fresh, contemporary feel. The kitchen has been completely updated with sleek new quartz countertops and new appliances, ready to inspire your culinary creations.

Enjoy peace of mind with a new HVAC system, a 10-year warranty (10 years on parts), and all-new ductwork. The new windows and metal flashing installed around the exterior enhance durability and curb appeal while filling the interior with natural light.
